box2D.collision.B2WorldManifold

type
class
This is used to compute the current state of a contact manifold.

Constructor

new()

Instance Variables

m_normal : box2D.common.math.B2Vec2

world vector pointing from A to B

m_points : Array<box2D.common.math.B2Vec2>

world contact point (point of intersection)

Instance Methods

initialize(manifold : B2Manifold, xfA : box2D.common.math.B2Transform, radiusA : Float, xfB : box2D.common.math.B2Transform, radiusB : Float) : Void

Evaluate the manifold with supplied transforms. This assumes modest motion from the original state. This does not change the point count, impulses, etc. The radii must come from the shapes that generated the manifold.
